text: I do actually I have a quick question. I would really like to work for companies like Framestore and Dneg and so after uni. Though I'm kinda working now I don't really want to settle. But It seems at least to get into them type of companies you kinda have to go in as a runner which kinda feels like a step back, So wasn't sure what your opinion was to do? if to Do that after uni or maybe work for a smaller company?
